metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16472 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A prototype pollution attack in cached-path-relative versions <=1.0.1 allows an attacker to inject properties on Object.prototype which are then inherited by all the JS objects through the prototype chain causing a DoS attack.

criterions.comment: node-cached-path-relative: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
